text: Charles Brahm (25 July 1917 - 26 May 2003) was a Belgian canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. In 1936 he and his partner Clement Spiette finished ninth in the K-2 10000 m event. ==References== *Charles Brahm's profile at Sports Reference.com *Charles Brahm's obituary Category:1917 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Belgian male canoeists Category:Canoeists at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic canoeists of Belgium
title: Charles Brahm
